dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset contains 2,975 training, 500 validation, and 1,525 testing video sequences, each with 30 frames and a resolution of 1024 Ã— 2048 pixels. It is used for semantic urban scene understanding, focusing on 19 semantic classes.
